info.introduction: My name is James Lawton. I'm passionate about neuroscience, blockchain, robotics, and AI. I currently work at Max Planck as a blockchain & AI developer.

Artificial Intelligence.title: AI Portfolio
Artificial Intelligence.description: An overview of my work with artificial intelligence. I'm most passionate about AI applied to robotics, human-machine interaction and task generalization.

Blockchain.title: Blockchain Portofolio
Blockchain.description: I build blockchain applications with a focus towards scientific applications to enhance the peer-review process, change current scientific publishing practices, and incentivize Open Access.
